response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in excellence. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, we believe its value far exceeds $15,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it offers, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you for a special introductory price of $18,000. Should you decide to accept this offer, you'll be among the first to experience its unmatched performance and quality. If you have any questions or require more information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 18000}
